description:
Cozy studio with tons of natural light in the heart of the East Village. 5 minute walk to the 1st Avenue L train and a 15 minute walk from Union Square! Endless restaurants and bars up and down Avenue A, as well as movie theaters and parks. Kitchen comes fully equipped with pots and pans and dishes. Bathroom also has a bathtub. Bed will be made with new sheets and new towels will be left out.

Insane amount of natural light!

Fire escape

I can help recommend any restaurants, bars, and fun things to do in the area!

So. much. good. food. Momofuku 5 minutes away!

5 minute walk to the L train and 15 minutes walk to Union Square which has the L, N, Q , R and 6 trains. Citi bike rack right outside the apartment.
name: Beautiful East Village Studio
review: The host canceled this reservation 33 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
